Name: Factory Hiro
About the game: Hiro Kikuchi (age 42) oversees an assembly line at the factory. Each day is a new puzzle that will test his reflexes, patience and quick thinking right as it all goes horribly wrong... Features Work obligations Pressure to perform An angry boss Stress
